unit.name: Tyrant
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge.

unit.name: Slaughtermaster
unit.description: Magic: A Slaughtermaster is a Level 4 wizard. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge.

unit.name: Butcher
unit.description: Magic: A Butcher is a Level 2 wizard. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge.

unit.name: Bruiser
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge.

unit.name: Firebelly
unit.description: Magic: A Firebelly is a Level 2 wizard. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge, Talismanic Tattoos, Fire Breath.

unit.name: Hunter
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour and Harpoon. Special Rules: Fear, Bull Charge, Pack Master, Beast Slayer

unit.name: Ogre Bull
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Bull Charge, Fear, Block (Iron Fist).

unit.name: Irongut
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Bull Charge, Fear.

unit.name: Gnoblar
unit.description: Equipment: Sharp Stuff. Special Rules: Expendable, Bicker.

unit.name: Gnoblar Trapper
unit.description: Equipment: Sharp Stuff. Special Rules: Expendable, Bicker, Scout, Skirmish, Entourage.

unit.name: Leadbelcher
unit.description: Equipment: Leadbelcher Cannon and light armour. Special Rules: Bull Charge, Fear.

unit.name: Sabertusk
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Light Cavalry, Trained Animal, Entourage.

unit.name: Yhetee
unit.description: Equipment: Ice weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Frost Aura, Ignores Difficult Terrain.

unit.name: Scraplauncha
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 6 Gnoblar Scrappers, 1 Rhinox. Equipment: Scraplauncha Catapult. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Fear, Bad Tempered.

unit.name: Gorger
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Stubborn, Immune to Psychology, Killing Blow, Ravenous, Drawn to Blood.

unit.name: Maneater
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Bull Charge, Fear, Stubborn, Immune to Psychology, Ragtag Unit.

unit.name: Slave Giant
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Stubborn, Immune to Panic, Large Target, Giant.

unit.name: Ironblaster
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 1 Leadbelcher, 1 Rhinox. Equipment: Cannon of the Sky Titans. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Fear, Bad Tempered.

unit.name: Rhinox Rider
unit.description: Mount: Rhinox. Equipment: Heavy Armour and hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (1), Fear, Bad Tempered.

unit.name: Stonehorn
unit.description: Monster: Stonehorn and 1 Ogre Beast Rider. Equipment: The Ogre Besast Rider is equipped with a Chaintrap. Special Rules: Smooth Ride, Large Target, Scaly Skin (4+), Impact Hits (D3), Bad Tempered, Terror.

unit.name: Thundertusk
unit.description: Monster: Thundertusk and 2 Ogre Beast Riders. Equipment: 1 Rider has a Chaintrap, 1 Rider has a Harpoon Launcher. Special Rules: Smooth Ride, Large Target, Sphere of Frost-wreathed Ice, Scaly Skin (5+), Terror, Frost Aura.

mount.name: Stonehorn
mount.description: Monster: Stonehorn (without Ogre Beast Rider). Special Rules: Smooth Ride, Large Target, Scaly Skin (4+), Impact Hits (D3), Bad Tempered, Terror.

item.name: BM Ash Storm (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Bonecruncher (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 18", 2D6 S2 hits, no AS

item.name: BM Braingobbler (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are not affected by this spell).

item.name: BM Breath of Embers (8+)
item.description: Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S4 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: BM Bullgorger (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gains +1S (including bull charge). Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Burning Head (8+)
item.description: Choose a point in the front arc of the caster then draw a straight 18" long line from the caster to that point. The burning head flies along this line until it reaches its end or hits impassable LOS blocking terrain. All models under the line (affected models are determined in the same way as for a cannon ball) suffer a S4 hit. Units that suffer at least one casualty have to take a panic test. Cannot be used if the caster, or the unit he is with, is engaged in cc.

item.name: BM Fiery Blast (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Fire Ball (5+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Toothcracker (10+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", Unit gains +1T and becomes Stubborn. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Trollguts (10+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gains Magic Resistance 2 and Regeneration (4+). Lasts until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Bad Tempered
item.description: At the end of the declare charges phase, if the unit didnt declare a charge but would be able to (has an enemy unit within charge range and could legally charge), it has to pass a Ld-test or has to charge the nearest possible enemy unit.

item.name: Bangstick
item.description: PM 2/7+, MM, Range 18", D6 S4 hits, for each to wound roll of a natural 1 the bearer suffers a S6 hit

item.name: Beast Slayer
item.description: This model rerolls to-wound rolls versus Large Targets.

item.name: Beastkiller
item.description: The model is Immune to Psychology and wounds inflicted by this model to Large Targets with mundane weapons in cc are doubled

item.name: Bicker
item.description: At the start of this units turn, if this unit is not in cc or broken, roll a D6. On a 1 the unit does nothing this turn.

item.name: Bloodcleaver
item.description: For each unsaved wound caused by this weapon the bearer regains a wound.

item.name: Brace of Handguns
Brace of Handguns (Champion)
Brace of Handguns (all)
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), Multiple Shot (2), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always stand and shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance. Count as additional hand weapons in cc.

item.name: Bull Charge
item.description: Impact Hits (1), models resolve those Impact Hits at +1S for each model directly behind (in the same file), up to a max of +2S

item.name: Bull Standard
item.description: Models in this unit rerolls failed to wound rolls on impact hits (Bull Charge)

item.name: Bullgut
item.description: +1AS. Impact hits are AP(1) and count as magical attacks. In the turn the bearer charges he has US6. Models on foot only.

item.name: Cannibal Totem
item.description: When fighting a unit of Monstrous Infantry, this unit rerolls all failed to-hit and to-wound rolls in the first round of combat and has to pursue if possible but cannot overrun these units.

item.name: Cannon of the Sky Titans
item.description: Cannon, Range 36", S10, D3 wounds, S10 Grapeshot, move or fire, no stand and shoot

item.name: Cathayan Jet
item.description: The bearer gets a Ward Save (3+) vs wounds caused by spells

item.name: Cathayan Longsword
Cathayan Longsword (all)
Cathayan Longsword (all)
item.description: +1WS, +1I, AP(1), cannot be combined with other weapons to count as additional hand weapon.

item.name: Chaintrap
item.description: Range 6", S6, Killing Blow, thrown weapon Harpoon Launcher: Range 36", S5, penetrates ranks, Large Targets suffer 2 wounds.

item.name: Deathcheater
item.description: Once per game, one enemy model (including mount etc.) must reroll successful to wound rolls against this model. Declare after the rolls are made.

item.name: Demon-Killer Scars
item.description: Model causes Terror.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Dragonhide Banner
item.description: In the turn the unit charged, it rerolls natural 1s on to-hit and to-wound rolls and enemies have to reroll successful armour saves.

item.name: Drawn to Blood
item.description: This unit may start the game in reserve. Beginning with turn 2, roll a d6 at the start of your turn: on a 4+ the model may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit), add +1 to the roll for each turn after the second, a natural 1 always fails.

item.name: Entourage
item.description: If this unit is within 12" of an Ogre Hunter, it uses the Ogre Hunters Ld for Ld-Test.

item.name: Expendable
item.description: This unit does not cause panic in friendly units, unless they are Expendable themselves.

item.name: Fire Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S3

item.name: Fistful of Laurels
item.description: Bearer and unit may reroll a failed break tests. One use only.

item.name: Frost Aura
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with at least one model with this special rule suffers -1 to hit in cc. Only character models with the Frost Aura special rule are allowed to join units with the Frost Aura special rule. Units with Frost Aura are immune to these effects themselves.

item.name: Giant
item.description: see chapter Giants in core rules

item.name: Giant Breaker
item.description: This model gains +1S, must accept challenges and cannot choose flee as a charge response. Does require a Slave Giant in the army.

item.name: Gnoblar Thiefstone
item.description: MR(1) for each stone, up to 2

item.name: Great Skull
item.description: +1AS. Spells targeting bearer (NOT unit he is in) cause a miscast at double 1s, 2s and 3s.

item.name: Great weapons (Heavy Cavalry)
Great weapon (all)
item.description: +2S, Always strikes last, Two-handed

item.name: Greedy Fist
item.description: +1 AS. When the bearer saves a wound caused by a magic weapon in cc with his armour or ward save, the weapon is destroyed. Wizards lose a magic level (lose one random BM or PM spell) for each wound suffered (after saves) in cc from the bearer.

item.name: Greyback Pelt
item.description: Enemies attacking the bearer in close combat suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls. In addition the bearer (and any unit of Sabertusks joined by the bearer) suffers no penalty for difficult terrain. Models on foot only.

item.name: Gruts Sickle
item.description: Once per turn, bearers unit can lose 1 Wound (no saves/regeneration allowed, does not cause panic), so that he get an additional PD for his next spell (BM or PM) in this magic phase. This dice may be used to increase the max. number of dice allowed by the level of the wizard by 1.

item.name: Gut Maw
item.description: +1AS. If enemy in challenge is killed, the bearer regains a number of wounds equal to the starting wounds of the killed model or gains one additional wound on top his starting wounds, should he be at full wounds.

item.name: Halfling Cookbook
item.description: Immune to effects of first miscast (BM or PM)

item.name: Harpoon
item.description: Range 12", S as bearer +1, thrown weapon

item.name: Harpoon Launcher
item.description: Range 36", S5, penetrates ranks, Large Targets suffer 2 wounds

item.name: Hellheart
item.description: Declare use at the start of any enemies magic phase. Enemy wizards suffer a miscast on any doubles in this magic phase. Does not affect PM. One use only.

item.name: Ice Weapon
item.description: Magical attacks

item.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fists
Iron Fist (Heavy Cavalry)
item.description: Counts as shield

item.name: Jade Lion
item.description: Bearer and unit may reroll any failed psychology tests. Effect ends for the rest of battle when they flee.

item.name: Kineater
item.description: Friendly untis within 6" reroll failed Panic tests.

item.name: Leadbelcher Cannon
item.description: Range 12", S4, AP(1), D6 shots, Dangerous, no penalties for move and shoot or multiple shots.

item.name: Look-Out Gnoblars
item.description: All standard bearers (including the BSB) are accompanied by a Look-Out Gnoblar which reduces the model requirement for "Ranged attacks at characters within or near units" (see the Characters section in the core rules) for these units from 5(4) down to 3 models.

item.name: Luck Gnoblar
item.description: Bearer may reroll one failed saving throw. One use only.

item.name: Mawseeker
item.description: +1T and suffers from Stupidity

item.name: Mountaineater
item.description: To-wound rolls of 1 and 2 always fail to wound this model.

item.name: PM Appetizer 3/5+
PM Appetizer 2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit rerolls natural 1s for to-wound rolls, cc only. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Blazing Flames 2/7+
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Units shooting at the target unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack. In addition each enemy model in BTB with the target unit receives a S3 hit in each players magic phase including the magic phase the spell is cast. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Bloodgruel 2/3+
item.description: Augment. Roll a D6: 1 = caster suffers 1 S6 hit, 2+ = caster regains 1 wound (up to starting amount)

item.name: PM Fla. Sword of Rhuin 2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets +1 to to-hit rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Iron Flesh 3/5+
PM Iron Flesh 2/5+
item.description: Augment, all friendly units within 6" of the caster gain Scaly Skin (6+). Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Pack Master
item.description: This model must not be the army general. It may only join units of Sabertusks. If he does so the unit may still move like Light Cavalry (at the speed of the hunter) but the hunter is not allowed to shoot after a march movement nor has he 360 LOS for his shooting.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Ragbanner
item.description: Unit rolls 3D6 for Panic test and discards the highest roll

item.name: Ragtag Unit
item.description: Each model in the unit may be equipped with a different weapon. The controlling player decides which models are removed as casualties. In cc models that are in BTB have to be chosen first.

item.name: Ravenous
item.description: If this model is not engaged in cc, it has to end the movement phase closer to an enemy unit than at the start of the movement phase.

item.name: Rock Eye
item.description: At the start of your turn, pick one enemy unit. The controlling player has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them).

item.name: Runemaw Banner
item.description: If a spell is successfully cast on this unit roll a D6: on a roll of 2+, the spell affects another friendly unit within 6" instead of this unit (choice of the Ogre player). This unit does not have to be a legal target (i.e. may be out of range and LOS). Has no effect on spells that do not target specific units and/or if there is no friendly unit within 6".

item.name: Scraplauncha Catapult
item.description: Catapult, Range 12-48", S2(2), 5“ Template, Killing Blow, no stand and shoot. The Scraplauncha Catapult may move and shoot but the crew is only allowed to use its BS when it stayed stationary.

item.name: Sharp Stuff
item.description: Range 8", S2, Multi Shot (2), Throwing Weapon

item.name: Siege Breaker
item.description: +3S, two handed, ASL, use enemy I instead of WS to determine to hit rolls.

item.name: Skull Mantle
item.description: Enemy suffer -1Ld to any Ld-test caused by the bearer and his unit

item.name: Skullplucker
item.description: Killing Blow

item.name: Smooth Ride
item.description: Riders may shoot even after marching. If the mount did not march, riders do not suffer a move and shoot penalty.

item.name: Sphere of Frost-wreathed Ice
item.description: Catapult, Range 6"-36", 3" Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds, no stand and shoot, may move and shoot but the model is only allowed to use its BS when it stayed stationary. Misfire: weapon does not fire and model suffers one wound (no saves allowed).

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Sword Gnoblar
item.description: One additional attack in cc at WS and I of bearer and S2

item.name: Talisman of Protection
item.description: Ward Save (6+)

item.name: Talismanic Tattoos
item.description: Magic Resistance 1, Ward Save (6+)

item.name: Tenderiser
item.description: Great weapon, causes D3 wounds

item.name: Tooth Gnoblar
item.description: Before casting a spell the user may use any number of Tooth Gnoblars to increase his next casting roll by +1 for each Tooth Gnoblar used (PM and BM). One use only.

item.name: Trained Animal
item.description: This unit may never use the Ld of the general. Only Hunters may join this unit.

item.name: Wallcrusher
item.description: This model inflicts an additional impact hit and ignores penalties for attacking defended obstacles. Has no effect if the model is mounted.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Wyrdstone Necklace
item.description: Ward Save (5+)
